DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, prospective, multicenter study. The aim of this study was to compare the changes of body weight,survival,toxicity,quality of life and opportunistic infection frequency in Locally Advanced Thoracic Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma between and after chemoradiotherapy with or without enteral nutrition therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Chemoradiotherapy With or Without Enteral Nutrition Intervention for Locally Advanced Thoracic Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma
